# OBJECT::BREAK_OBJECT_FRAGMENT_CHILD

## Summary
Specifying the component removed the entire group that the component is part of

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** object
* **INT** component
* **BOOL** disappear: Will make the group pop out of existence, otherwise the group will break off.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Remove one of the parts of an fragment based object.
